Traits.Name: Open Rift
Traits.Description: Create a pit under any character hit by the wraith's attacks.

Actions.Name: Boiling Curse
Actions.Description: Choose a free space in range 6. The next time a non-relict character passes over such a space, it explodes in a blast 1 area effect. Non-relict characters inside take [D] and are electrified. Electrified characters are stunned. The space lasts until the end of combat or until detonated.
